# itsi_entity_type (Data Source)

Fetch an entity type id.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "itsi_entity_type" "host" {
  title = "Host"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `title` (String) The name of the entity type

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier for this entity type
